column1: Antsohihy is a city (commune urbaine) in northern Madagascar in Sofia Region.
Antsohihy is the capital of Sofia Region and of Antsohihy District. It is situated at the junction of Route nationale 6 and Route nationale 32.
Antsohihy is served by a local airport.
The town hosts the annexes of the University Institute of Technology and Agronomy of Mahajanga (IUTAM)
column2: the University Institute of Management and Administration (IUGM) and the School of Law and Political Science (EDSP) of the University of Mahajanga. A regional centre for distance education (CRTE) of the Centre National de Télé-Enseignement de Madagascar (CNETMAD) is also located in Antsohihy
